S03n252:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān dhyānābhyāsopacitasya kuśalasya karmaṇo vipākaprabhāvād brahmaloke janma pratilebhe |
S03n252:4: tasya tanmahadapi dhyānaviśeṣādhigataṃ brāhmaṃ sukhaṃ pūrvajanmasu kāruṇyaparicayānnaiva parahitakaraṇavyāpāranirutsukaṃ manaścakāra |
S03n252:6: dhyānasukhairapi tu satāṃ na tiraskriyate parahitecchā ||1 ||
S03n252:7: atha kadācitsa mahātmā karuṇāśrayabhūtaṃ vividhadūḥkhavyasanaśatopasṛṣṭamutkliṣṭavyāpādavihiṃsākāmadhātuṃ kāmadhātuṃ vyalokayan dadarśa videharājamaṅgadinnaṃ nāma kumitrasaṃparkadoṣādasanmanaskāraparicayācca mithyādṛṣṭigahane paribhramantam |
S03n252:9: kutaḥ śubhaśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipāka ityevaṃ sa niścayamupetya praśāntadharmakriyautsukyaḥ pradānaśīlādisukṛtapratipattivimukhaḥ saṃrūḍhaparibhavabuddhirdhārmikeṣvaśraddhārūkṣamatirdharmaśāstreṣu parihāsacittaḥ parlokakathāsu śithilavinayopacāragauravabahumānaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇeṣu kāmasukhaparāyaṇo babhūva |
S03n252:10: śubhāśubhaṃ karma sukhāsukhodayaṃ dhruvaṃ paratreti virūḍhaniścayaḥ |
S03n252:11: apāsya pāpa yatate śubhāśrayo yatheṣṭamaśraddhatayā tu gamyate ||2 ||
S03n252:12: atha sa mahātmā devarṣistasya rājñastena dṛṣṭivyasanopanipātenāpāyikena lokānarthākarabhūtena samāvarjitānukampastasya rājño viṣayasukhākalitamateḥ śrīmati pravivikte vimānadeśe'vatiṣṭhamānasyābhijvalan brahmalokātpurastātsamavatatāra |
S03n252:13: atha sa rājā tamagniskandhamiva jvalantaṃ vidyutsamūhamiva cāvabhāsamānaṃ dinakarakīraṇasaṃghātamiva ca parayā dīptyā virocamānamabhivīkṣya tattejasābhibhūtamatiḥ sasaṃbhramaḥ prāñjalirena pratyutthāya sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇa ityuvāca-
S03n252:14: karoti te bhūriva saṃparigrahaṃ nabho'pi padmopamapāda pādayoḥ |
S03n252:15: vibhāsi saurīmiva codvahan prabhāṃ vilocanānandanarūpa ko bhavān ||3 ||
S03n252:21: ityukte sa rājā svāgatādipriyavacanapuraḥsaraṃ pādyārghyasatkāramasmai samupahṛtya savismayamenamabhivīkṣamāṇa uvāca-āścaryarūpaḥ khalu te maharṣe ṛddhiprabhāvaḥ |
S03n252:25: dhyānasya śīlasya ca nirmalasya varasya caivendriyasaṃvarasya |
S03n252:30: rājovāca-kathaṃ punaridaṃ mārṣa śakyamasmābhirapi śraddhātuṃ syāt ?
S03n252:34: pratyakṣarūpaḥ paraloka eṣa mā te'tra saṃdehajaḍā matirbhūt ||7 ||
S03n252:35: jātismarāḥ santi ca tatra tatra dhyānābhiyogātsmṛtipāṭavācca |
S03n252:36: ato'pi lokaḥ parato'numeyaḥ sākṣyaṃ ca nanvatra kṛtaṃ mayaiva ||8 ||
S03n252:38: ādyā hi yā garbhagatasya buddhiḥ sānantaraṃ pūrvakajanmabuddheḥ ||9 ||
S03n252:39: jñeyāvabodhaṃ ca vadanti buddhiṃ janmādibuddherviṣayo'sti tasmāt |
S03n252:40: na caihiko'sau nayanādyabhāvātsiddhau yadiyastu paraḥ sa lokaḥ ||10 ||
S03n252:41: pitryaṃ svabhāvaṃ vyatiricya dṛṣṭaḥ śīlādibhedaśca yataḥ prajānām |
S03n252:46: abhyāsasiddhirhi paṭukaroti śikṣāgaṇaṃ karmasu teṣu teṣu ||13 ||
S03n252:55: yatnaśca nāsti kamale stanape tu dṛṣṭaḥ
S03n252:57: tadevaṃ mahārāja samyagupaparīkṣamāṇena śakyametacchraddhātum-asti paraloka iti |
S03n252:58: atha sa rājā mithyādṛṣṭiparigrahābhiniviṣṭabuddhitvādupacitapāpatvācca tāṃ paralokakathāṃ śrutvā asukhāyamāna uvāca-bho maharṣe,
S03n252:60: grāhyaṃ mayaitaditi vā yadi manyase tvam |
S03n252:63: atha bodhisattvastadasya prāgalbhyaparicayanirviśaṅkaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiviṣodgārabhūtamasamudācāravacanaṃ yukteneva krameṇa pratyuvāca-
S03n252:64: ihāpi tāvaddhanasaṃpadarthinaḥ prayuñjate naiva dhanaṃ durātmani |
S03n252:65: na ghasmare nānipuṇe na cālase gataṃ hi yattatra tadantameti tat ||17 ||
S03n252:66: yameva paśyanti tu savyapatrapaṃ śamābhijātaṃ vyavahāranaipuṇam |
S03n252:67: ṛṇaṃ prayacchanti raho'pi tadvidhe tadarpaṇaṃ hyabhyudayāvahaṃ dhanam ||18 ||
S03n252:68: kramaśca tāvadvidha eva gamyatāmṛṇaprayoge nṛpa pāralaukike |
S03n252:73: na caiva tārāgaṇabhūṣaṇaṃ nabhaḥ saraḥ prabuddhaiḥ kumudairivekṣyate ||21 ||
S03n252:74: paratra yasminnivasanti nāstikā ghanaṃ tamastatra himaśca mārutaḥ |
S03n252:75: karoti yo'stīnyapi dārayan rujaṃ tamātmavān kaḥ praviśeddhanepsayā ||22 ||
S03n252:79: diśaḥ pradhāvanti tadunmumukṣayā na cāntamāyāntyaśubhasya nāyuṣaḥ ||24 ||
S03n252:80: ātakṣya takṣāṇa ivāpareṣāṃ gātrāni raudrā viniyamya yāmyāḥ |
S03n252:83: na cāyānti nāśaṃdhṛtā duṣkṛtaiḥ svaistathā cāpare khaṇḍaśaśchidyamānāḥ ||26 ||
S03n252:91: samāni pañcāpi samāśatāni saṃcūrṇyamānā visṛjanti nāsūn ||29 ||
S03n252:93: pāṭyanta ūrdhvamadha eva ca kṛṣyamāṇāḥ krūrai ravairapuruṣaiḥ puruṣairyamasya ||30 ||
S03n252:101: kecittīkṣṇaiḥ śastravarṣaiḥ kṣatāṅgā nistvaṅmāṃsā vyālasaṃghaiḥ kriyante ||33 ||
S03n252:102: kecitklāntā vahnisaṃsparśatīkṣṇaṃ kṣāraṃ toyaṃ vaitaraṇyāṃ viśanti |
S03n252:103: saṃśīryante yatra māṃsāni teṣāṃ no tu prāṇā duṣkṛtairdhāryamāṇā ||35 ||
S03n252:116: yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam ||39 ||
S03n252:120: yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam ||40 ||
S03n252:124: yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam ||41 ||
S03n252:125: prāptaṃ parābhavaṃ taṃ duḥkhāni mahānti kastadānubhavantam |
S03n252:128: vidāryamāṇa bhṛśamārtinādinaṃ paratra kastvārhati yācituṃ dhanam ||43 ||
S03n252:132: viśasanairvividhaiśca sadāturaḥ kathamṛṇaṃ pratidāsyasi me tadā ||45 ||
S03n252:134: tāṃ nirayakathāmatibhīṣaṇāṃ samupaśrutya jātasaṃvegastyaktamithyādṛṣṭyanurāgo labdhasaṃpratyayaḥ paraloke,
S03n252:136: niśamya tāvannareṣu yātanāṃ bhayādidaṃ vidravatīva me manaḥ |
S03n252:137: kathaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na tāṃ sameyivān vitakravahnirdahatīva māṃ punaḥ ||46 ||
S03n252:139: tadatra me sādhugatirgatirbhavān parāyaṇaṃ tvaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca me mune ||47 ||
S03n252:140: yathaiva me dṛṣṭitamastvayoddhṛtaṃ divākareṇeva samudyatā tamaḥ |
S03n252:141: tathaiva mārgaṃ tvamṛṣe pracakṣva me bhajeya yenāhamito na durgatim ||48 ||
S03n252:142: athainaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃvignamānasamṛjūbhūtadṛṣṭiṃ dharmapratipattipātrabhūtamavekṣya piteva putramācārya iva ca śiṣyamanukampamāna iti samanuśaśāsa-
S03n252:143: suśiṣyavṛttyā śramaṇadvijeṣu pūrve guṇaprema yathā vicakruḥ |
S03n252:144: nṛpāḥ svavṛttyā ca dayāṃ prajāsu kīrtikṣamaḥ sa tridivasya panthāḥ ||49 ||
S03n252:145: adharmamasmād bhṛśadurjayaṃ jayan kadaryabhāvaṃ ca durutaraṃ taran |
S03n252:146: upaihi ratnātiśayojjvalaṃ jvalan divaspateḥ kāñcanagopuraṃ puram ||50 ||
S03n252:149: tvayā hi saddarśanasādhunādhunā narendra vṛttena yiyāsatā satā |
S03n252:150: yadaiva citte guṇarūkṣatā kṣatā tadaiva te mārgakṛtāspadaṃ padam ||52 ||
S03n252:151: kuruṣva tasmād guṇasādhanaṃ dhanaṃ śivāṃ ca loke svahitodayāṃ dayām |
S03n252:152: sthiraṃ ca śīlendriyasaṃvaraṃ varaṃ paratra hi syādaśivaṃ na tena te ||53 ||
S03n252:155: tvamatra sanmānasasārathī rathī sva eva deho guṇasūratho rathaḥ |
S03n252:162: caran parātmārthamamohabhāsvatā na jātu rājannirayaṃ gamiṣyasi ||58 ||
S03n252:163: iti sa mahātmā tasya rājñastadasaddarśanāndhakāraṃ bhāsvarairvacanakiraṇairvyavadhūya prakāśya cāsmai sugatimārgaṃ tatraivāntardadhe |
S03n252:164: atha sa rājā samupalabdhaparalokavṛttāntatattvaḥ pratilabdhasamyagdarśanacetāḥ sāmātyapaurajānapado dānadamasaṃyamaparāyaṇo babhūva |
S03n252:168: evamāsādanāmapi santastaddhitopadeśena pratinudanti kṣamāparicayānna pāruṣyeṇeti satpraśaṃsāyāṃ kṣāmāvarṇe'pi vācyam |
